name: LD39 - Herkuel The Strong Arm
description:
Help out Herkuel lift the weight. Hurry! There's little strength left in Herkuel's arms! Get to all 6 endings on this witty short story text adventure.

Instructions:

Best played anything with a keyboard and a browser.
Works on mobile!
Press on the '>' to type.
Type commands in to help Herkuel!

A text adventure game by @tehPHEN. Made in 48 hours* for Ludum Dare 39 - Running out of Power.

If there's bugs just tweet at @tehPHEN.

*May contain spelling errors, depending if I was caffeinated or not.
